snippet: The more you can do ahead, the happier you’ll be on the big day.
abstract: The more you can do ahead, the happier you’ll be on the big day.

headline.main: What Can I Prepare Before the Actual Day of Thanksgiving?

snippet: If there is one thing I've learned from my husband's marathon running, it's that strength and stamina alone won't necessarily get you to the finish line. The difference between a good run and an excruciating ordeal is solid planning. Thanksgiving,...
abstract: If there is one thing I've learned from my husband's marathon running, it's that strength and stamina alone won't necessarily get you to the finish line. The difference between a good run and an excruciating ordeal is solid planning. Thanksgiving, that marathon of meals, requires the same kind of advance preparation.

headline.main: What Can I Prepare Before the Actual Day of Thanksgiving?

snippet: Apple is reaching into Google's Wallet.     This week Apple introduced a new feature for the iPhone in its Apple Store app. The feature, called EasyPay, allows people to take a picture of the bar code of a product with the phone's camera and then ...

headline.main: Paying by iPhone At Apple Stores

snippet: The challenge Nokia faces in the smartphone market was grimly detailed last week. In the third quarter, according to IDC, Nokia's worldwide smartphone sales fell 37 percent to 16.8 million phones from 26.5 million a year ago.     Nokia's retreat c...
abstract: Bits blog notes Nokia chief executive Stephen Elop says vendors are hungry for an alternative to the Android/iOS smartphone models; notes he expects new Nokia phones will stand out. Photo (M)

headline.main: Nokia Chief Looks For a Turnaround In Smartphones
